attributes.action: Have a Snap General Election - Get Cameron out!
attributes.additional_details:
Under Conservatives reform, the gap between the rich and poor is increasing. The NHS is being destroyed, social housing is being taken away, Benefits are being cut for the most Vulnerable. Yet multi-million-pound organisation are getting tax breaks. 
Allow the people to make a better informed decisions with a manifesto that actually benefits the people and not one full of lies.
Allow us to have a snap election!
attributes.background: Under Conservatives reform, the gap between the rich and poor is increasing.
